channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VT

item.title: Report X-2025020843
item.description:
Report X-2025020843

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-23T00:59:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-12
  • City: BRATTLEBORO
  • State: VT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS UNLOADED FROM TRAILER; SOME STAINING WAS NOTICED ON THE OUTER CARTON. THE SUPERVISOR IN CHARGE DID NOT KNOW WHERE THE STAINING CAME FROM SO IN AN ABUNDANCE OF CAUTION THE PACKAGE WAS REMOVED FROM THE BELT. UPON CLOSURE INSPECTION AND OPENING OF THE OUTER CARTON, IT WAS DETERMINED THAT THE PRODUCT WAS INDEED LEAKING SLIGHTLY.
